preqs: Admission to an Art & Design course or permission

rules.ruleString: Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {APA1101, APA1111, APA1122, APA1202, APA1212, APA1213}

proh: APA1101, or APA111, or APA1122, or APA1202, or APA1212, or APA1213
description: This unit introduces students to the practice and theory of ceramics as a means of contemporary creative expression. It focuses on raising awareness of and providing the means to achieve an initial level of competence within the ceramics discipline, while imparting a sound conceptual and technical basis for continuing study in that discipline. The safe handling of materials and equipment is emphasized as an essential part of all studio practice.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
